sent.orig: It is so quiet in the room that you can hear the drop of a pin.
sent.trans: 房间里静得连（地上）掉根针都能听见。[用于so that 结构，有时 that 可以省略]以便，为了，所以

sent.orig: Look, you've typed "do" as "so", and made nonsense of the whole sentence.
sent.trans: 瞧，你把do打成了so，这样一来句子就不通了。

sent.orig: An irony is so quiet and so delicate that many readers never notice it.
sent.trans: 一句讥讽的话是那样的温和， 那样的含蓄不露，以致许多读者都没有注意到。

sent.orig: Are you a good swimmer? -- Just so-so. I can't swim far.
sent.trans: 你的游泳技术怎么样？--马马虎虎，游不远。

sent.orig: But it is more important not to think lies, or to slide into those mechanical and untruthful habits of thought which are so pleasant and so easy as descents to mental ineptitude.
sent.trans: 但是更重要的是不去想谎言，也不陷入无意识的、不诚实的思维习惯，这种思维习惯如此他令人惬意和自在，就象沦为智力低能一样。
